query:
ALTER TABLE users 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS company VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS city VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS accountStatus ENUM('pending', 'active', 'trial', 'suspended') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS trialEndsAt TIMESTAMP NULL;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2g8chP3aro94bni.root --database XnmtZZwX6e46H8JVZbq4Ta --execute ALTER TABLE users 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS company VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS city VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS accountStatus ENUM('pending', 'active', 'trial', 'suspended') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS trialEndsAt TIMESTAMP NULL;
